name: fathomable
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
possible to understand: not fathomable How this situation arose in the first place is not fathomable. The scene takes place, for no easily fathomable reason, in a bath tub.
More examplesFewer examplesIt is not fathomable how such a risk can be ignored.For reasons that are not fathomable, his music never dates but remains uncannily timeless.Biography tries to bring literary genius down to earth, to render it fathomable. I haven't detected a fathomable plot yet but we're only two episodes in.He seems unable to construct a fathomable sentence.
